1327060.name: Selatria Demo
1327060.description: Enter the world of Selatria in which the magical powers of the world all come from one source known as Selatria! In this game demo, you will get to play through Chapter One of Selatria. Join Mage and Melanie as they are thrown into the frey of battle to finish a 100-year war that was thought to be won a long time ago. Take sword to hand, and arm yourself with your best casting spells in this strategy RPG Adventure game that shares the same love for retro JRPGs back on the SNES!
1327060.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
